title: vanjamillAdunnai
sahitya:
vanjamillAdunnai tanjamenraDaindEn vAcAmagOcaranE


anupallavi

  anja varum paghaivar nanju vaittapOdum anjal enrennaik-kAttAi aDaikkalam aDaikkalam


caraNam    AtrAip-porAmaigaL tUTrit-tirinda pOdum arccanai malargaLai duccamAi miditta pOdum
sITram koNDE satik-kUTTam segutta pOdum siddhattil irundu nI shuddhA enaik-kAttAi
